name: public pythonmancer browser demo
description:
Pythonmancer is a game inspired by traditional JRPGs and other turn based strategy games.

You awaken as a soldier of an empire embroiled in conflict. To begin your evacuation, start rescuing other heroes that can help you escape the tower. Along the way you will fight many variations of creatures that will be looking for their own way to survive. 

In this journey you will encounter...

1.  Turn based combat that is easy to learn but hard to master.

2. Seamless exploration through a vast and detailed dungeon. 

3. An ever changing tower that has many enemies that will level up with you. 

4. Several characters who can join your party as powerful allies.
